GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user by their username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article by it's id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/:article_id/comments.description: allows you to post a comment to an article by it's id

GET /api/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments linked to an article

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: allows you to upvote a comment by it's id

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: allows you to delete a comment by it's id
